notification_album_start_soon_title: ⌛️ Your album %{album} will be open soon...
notification_album_start_soon_body: Be ready to take pictures during the event!
notification_album_ongoing_body: Don't forget to take pictures on the event!
notification_album_end_soon_body: You have 2 hours left to add pictures to the album before it will be closed!
notification_album_reviewed_body: You can now see all the pictures taken by everyone.
notification_album_create_reminder_body: Don't forget to create your album and invite your participants!
